name: The Bee Game (itch)
description:
This is a game about bees. Leave the hive, collect pollen and return before night falls.

This is a small game I've wanted to make for ages. I've always wanted to make a game which takes concepts and mechanics from the natural world.

I also used it as an opportunity to learn Godot. I'm still learning so some bits are a tad shaky (particularly UI) but I managed to learn quickly.

Enjoy!
